author: Judith Prakash J:
casename: Perwira Affin Bank Berhad (formerly known as Perwira Habib Bank Malaysia Berhad) v Lee Hai Pey and Another
counsel: Leo Cheng Suan (Infinitus Law Corporation) for the plaintiff; Denis Tan (Toh Tan & Partners) for the second defendant
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Foreign judgments/Reciprocal enforcement/Judgment obtained in Malaysia/Registration in Singapore/Application for registration order to be perfected/Whether just and convenient to allow foreign judgment to be enforced in local courts/Section 3(1) Reciprocal Enforcement of Commonwealth Judgments Act (Cap 264, 1985 Rev Ed)
